Package org.numenta.nupic.util

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Condition<T>
    Implemented to be used as arguments in other operations.
    FlatMatrix<T>
    Provides contract for flat matrix implementations.
    Generator<T>  
    Matrix<T>
    Base interface for Matrices.
    PeekableIterator<T>
    Implementors add the ability to return the "next" item which would be returned by a call to Iterator.next() - without altering the iterator's pointer to the indexed item.
    SparseMatrix<T>
    Allows storage of array data in sparse form, meaning that the indexes of the data stored are maintained while empty indexes are not.
    TypeFactory<T>  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractFlatMatrix<T>
    Base class for flat Matrix implementations.
    AbstractSparseBinaryMatrix
    Base class for matrices containing specifically binary (0 or 1) integer values
    AbstractSparseBinaryMatrixTest  
    AbstractSparseMatrix<T>
    Allows storage of array data in sparse form, meaning that the indexes of the data stored are maintained while empty indexes are not.
    ArrayUtils
    Utilities to match some of the functionality found in Python's Numpy.
    ArrayUtils.CoordinateAssembler
    Helper Class for recursive coordinate assembling
    ArrayUtilsTest  
    BeanUtil
    Singleton helper for reading/writing beans properties
    BeanUtil.PropertyInfo  
    BitSetMatrix
    FlatMatrix implementation that store booleans in a BitSet.
    Condition.Adapter<T>
    Convenience adapter to remove verbosity
    ConditionTest  
    Coordinator
    Specializes in handling coordinate transforms for N-dimensional integer arrays, between flat and coordinate indexing.
    DecodeTuple<M extends java.util.Map<java.lang.String,RangeList>,L extends java.util.List<java.lang.String>>
    Subclass of Tuple to specifically contain the results of an Encoder's Encoder#encode(double) call.
    Deque<E>
    Double ended queue implementation which has a restricted capacity.
    DequeTest  
    FastConnectionsMatrix
    Fast implementation of SparseBinaryMatrix for use as ConnectedMatrix in Connections
    FastRandom
    Implementation of George Marsaglia's elegant Xorshift random generator 30% faster and better quality than the built-in java.util.random see also see http://www.javamex.com/tutorials/random_numbers/xorshift.shtml
    FastRandomSerializationTest  
    FastRandomTest  
    FlatArrayMatrix<T>
    FlatMatrix implementation that store objects in a flat object array.
    FlatArrayMatrixTest  
    GeneratorTest  
    GroupBy<T,R>
    Allegory to the Python itertools.groupby.
    GroupBy2<R extends java.lang.Comparable<R>>
    An Java extension to groupby in Python's itertools.
    GroupBy2.Slot<T>
    A minimal Serializable version of an GroupBy2.Slot
    GroupBy2Test  
    GroupByTest  
    IntGenerator
    Generates a range of integers.
    IntGeneratorTest  
    LowMemorySparseBinaryMatrix
    Low Memory implementation of SparseBinaryMatrix without a backing array.
    LowMemorySparseBinaryMatrixTest

    MatrixTest
    Generic test for Matrix hirearchy.
    MersenneTwister
    MersenneTwister and MersenneTwisterFast
    MersenneTwisterFast
    MersenneTwister and MersenneTwisterFast
    MersenneTwisterFastTest
    Trivial Tests to keep CI Travis, Coveralls Happy
    MersenneTwisterTest
    Trivial Tests to keep CI Travis, Coveralls Happy
    MethodSignature
    Tuple type that allows the setting of method parameters while setting those parameters on this object - in the same statement.
    MethodSignatureTest  
    MinMax
    Holds two values, a min and a max.
    MutableNamedTuple  
    MutableNamedTupleTest  
    MutableTuple
    Mutable and reusable version of a Tuple

    NamedTuple
    Immutable tuple which adds associative lookup functionality.

    NearestNeighbor  
    NearestNeighborTest  
    RangeTuple<L extends java.util.List<MinMax>,S>
    Subclasses the Tuple utility class to constrain the number of arguments and argument types to those specifically related to the Encoder functionality.
    SetSparseMatrix
    SparseMatrix implementation that use a Set to store indexes.
    SetSparseMatrixTest  
    SortablePair<F extends java.lang.Comparable<F>,S>
    Holds a pair of generic entries which can be treated as a single unit in which the first argument must be an instance of Comparable for sorting purposes.
    SparseBinaryMatrix
    Implementation of a sparse matrix which contains binary integer values only.
    SparseBinaryMatrixTest  
    SparseObjectMatrix<T>
    Allows storage of array data in sparse form, meaning that the indexes of the data stored are maintained while empty indexes are not.
    SparseObjectMatrixTest  
    Topology  
    TopologyTest  
    Tuple
    An immutable fixed data structure whose values are retrieved via a given index.
    TupleTest  
    UniversalRandom
    This also has a Python version which is guaranteed to output the same random numbers if given the same initial seed value.
    UniversalRandomTest
    Tests the UniversalRandom class designed to implement the same algorithm and produce the same output as the UniversalRandom of the Python universal_random.py file.
